New Records: Nicholas Pooran scored 67 runs from 40 balls
Key Match Events: West Indies won by 2 wickets with 7 balls to spare
Nicholas Pooran reached his fifty from 29 balls
Tilak Varma scored his maiden T20 half-century
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Providence under steaming sunshine
The third T20I will be played at Providence on Tuesday from 10:30h local time
Others: India won the toss and opted to bat first
Pandya was the pick of the Indian bowlers with 3-35 from his four overs
